feed.title: JellyBook Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for JellyBook: Announcing Version 1.2.0
entry.content:
Main Changes:

  • Many new translations
  • FIxed issues with collection not showing books downloaded
  • Added AudioBook Support
  • Added EPUB Tags
  • Update books on server
  • Redesigned settings screens
  • RTL (Right to left) and vertical reading support
  • Improved search screen
  • Complete overhaul of book info screen UI
  • fixed issues with scaling
  • various optimizations
  • added ComicRack XML
  • Fixed Indefinate Loading
  • Added authors (all types supported by ComicRack) support to comics

What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/70
  • Updated Translations using Weblate by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/76
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/78
  • Add new translation String using Weblate (English) by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/79
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/80
  • Translated using Weblate by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/81
  • add listen while reading a book player by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/82
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/83
  • Updated translations and added a few by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/84
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/85
  • Translations by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/86

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/101

entry.title: New release for JellyBook: Announcing Version 1.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update README.md by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/110
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/108
  • Translated using Weblate by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/111
  • Implement audiobook playback speed setting as first seen in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/109 by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/114
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/112
  • Added Translations by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/115
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/116
  • Added Seamless vertical scrolling key value pair by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/117
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/118
  • Translations by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/119
  • Version 1.2.1 by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/120
  • Bump archive from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/121

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/Kara-Zor-El/JellyBook/pull/121

entry.title: New release for JellyBook: v1.3.0
entry.content:
Hi y'all. I'm so sorry for how long this update took. I was going through a lot of stuff including it being exam season and getting sick a few times. I worked really hard on the features in this update and am really proud to present the edit screen for eBooks

New Features

  • New display system for description of entries (c8bf4906529f95b3d04f33e70dcef18e18bf31c8)
  • New edit screen to allow you to edit you book locally or globally (89d501c3bafcfaac6f49c5b1f00d799bc0cfd3d5, c72edd3526f8c25e87f7918a33fae6f9bb1f3a8f)
  • Added wave progress bar for download screen (86ae7bfbb392ab48f248d3a6805d1175b40912ed)

| Preview | Editing | | ------- | ------- | | | | | | |

Changes

  • Added background media playback to the android manifest and build system (48158690a32d7938e9d18baf9e3ed577473dd9b9)
  • Added ability to upload images from iOS to app as ebook/audiobook cover (a2e4df918f4d7e2035049f383aaa8804c6a84652)
  • Fixed paragraph marker for RichText / Markdown (581f8d1431c2777ad8b50fd4de613add512b0709)
  • Turn Author Class into own file (c91b5c9f6c46c85382488fee9c1330a00f3d5313)
  • Converted RichText bodies into MarkdownBody bodies to have better formatting (c8bf4906529f95b3d04f33e70dcef18e18bf31c8)
  • Updated boxWidthWithShaddow to allow local images and size (d90678056c292b8ef0e57361924a95b192c2cb57)
  • Created editing screen (89d501c3bafcfaac6f49c5b1f00d799bc0cfd3d5, c72edd3526f8c25e87f7918a33fae6f9bb1f3a8f)
  • Fix buttons in settings screen (0fedf322a7a158cdc3db87afc087866c78feca0e)
  • Translations (3efa3e99e83dac2cc79707d05a47eff2821eb879, 764dae81586ecc0350c412b2a82d4632e19d70a9, d6e4821a1143d9ffd6e24d9abfaa005b1a58f4a2, 76708f1f9168e8acf88b57a6bb1c3a68c4e151a5, 419cd2502506d9df33c3852ebc13539e708748cf, d04b7cf53117a5781b2aa767d21024d973948faa, 62972976a4a5e5f20af8d9398cab2f36867f92be)
  • Updated Gradle and CocoaPods (179174befdbe4b94acbc904f531989badfe32821)
  • Added wave progress bar (86ae7bfbb392ab48f248d3a6805d1175b40912ed)
  • Fixed issue with edit screen (b2bb5e250bc9e7c0089425b5a94c09ded2ba828b)
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/130
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/132
  • Update Strings in Italian and Croation by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/134
  • Add localized decimal separators by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/135
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/136
  • Translated using Weblate (Chinese (Simplified)) by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/137
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/138
  • Update Translations by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/139
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/141

entry.title: New release for JellyBook: v1.3.1
entry.content:
Announcing Version 1.3.1

What's Changed

  • Lazy loading is finnaly here (Thank you @Chaphasilor for the huge help throughout the entire process)
  • initial fastlane structures from IzzyOnDroid by @IzzySoft in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/150
  • Add Seamless vertical scrolling by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/153
  • Fix pagination by @Chaphasilor in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/158
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/159
  • Add Phrases for Sentry Usage by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/160
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/161
  • add yes and no strings by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/162
  • Version 1.3.1 by @Kara-Zor-El in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/152

New Contributors

  • @IzzySoft made their first contribution in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/150
  • @Chaphasilor made their first contribution in https://github.com/JellyBookOrg/JellyBook/pull/158
